code: import React from'react';import{MapPin,Star,Clock,ChevronRight}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DestinationCard=_ref=>{let{destination,onClick}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"destination-card",onClick:()=>onClick(destination),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"destination-image",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:destination.image,alt:destination.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"destination-category",children:destination.category})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"destination-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"destination-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"destination-name",children:destination.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"destination-location",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MapPin,{size:14})," ",destination.district]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"destination-description",children:destination.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"destination-meta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"destination-rating",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Star,{size:16,fill:"currentColor"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:destination.rating})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"destination-duration",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Clock,{size:16})," ",destination.duration]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"destination-footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"view-details-btn",children:["View Details ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChevronRight,{size:16})]})})]});};export default DestinationCard;
